DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety short-term effectiveness implantation 'Flowise Cerebral Flow Diverter ' treatment unruptured wide-necked cerebral aneurysm internal carotid artery .
DOC.brief_title: A Feasibility Study Evaluate Safety Effectiveness Implantation Flowise Cerebral Flow Diverter ( Flowise )
DOC.detailed_description: Flowise indicate use patient unruptured wide-necked aneurysm internal carotid artery . Consecutive subject data collect discharge , 1 , 3 , 6 month post Flowise implantation .
DOC.criteria: Functional neurological state ≤2 mRS Unruptured wideneck aneurysm internal carotid artery size > 8mm , neck ≥4mm , dome/neck ratio < 2 Parent artery diameter ≥3.25mm ≤4.5mm Patient willing provide write informed consent comply followup requirement Intracranial hemorrhage within 30 day Untreated ruptured intracranial aneurysm ≥1 intracranial aneurysm except target one require treatment within 6 month Immunosuppressive disease Active infectious disease ( e.g . endocarditis , meningitis ) Platelet count < 100 x 103 cells/mm3 Female childbearing potential unable take adequate contraceptive precaution , know pregnant , currently breastfeed infant .
